body.p: Married to Permelia Jane Welsh Radley. Father of Louisiana Radley Starling, Sallie Radley, John Radley, and Mary H. Radley. Served as a constable in Hardin County, Kentucky in 1847. Served as sheriff of Hardin County, Kentucky from 1858 to 1863.
